content: Hear this word that I take up over you in lamentation, O house of Israel:
The Day of the Lord a Dark Day
Alas for you who desire the day of the !
or went into the house and rested a hand against the wall,
Is not the day of the  darkness, not light,
Did you bring to me sacrifices and offerings the forty years in the wilderness, O house of Israel?
You shall take up Sakkuth your king, and Kaiwan your star-god, your images, which you made for yourselves;
therefore I will take you into exile beyond Damascus, says the , whose name is the God of hosts.
